subject: Cleanse Your Body of Toxins and Waste
body:
Try Colon Cleansing At Home 

Did you know that the average person stores between 5 to 25 POUNDS 
of waste accumulated over the years in their colon? Did you know that 
some health experts say that 90% of all sickness and diseases are 
related to an unclean colon? 

This is a natural method for gently eliminating harmful wastes and 
toxins from your body!
